articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.title: Microsoft’s vision for AI PCs looks a lot like another crack at Cortana - Ars Technica
articles.description: Copilot expands with an emphasis on creating and editing files, voice input.

articles.author: Christine Ji
articles.title: Oracle’s stock rises as Wall Street’s AI profitability concerns are put to rest - MarketWatch
articles.description: The tech giant raises its long-term financial targets and projects strong cloud margins, reassuring investors that its massive AI spending spree is on a path to profitability
articles.content:
Oracle Corp. solidified its position as an artificial-intelligence leader at its AI World Conference, as the company raised guidance and shared positive business developments.
Investors were looking… [+348 chars]
